entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight then periods of light snow. Wind east 30 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 15 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 17.
